sn11.8:1.2: Now at that time the Buddha had gone into retreat for the day’s meditation.
sn11.8:1.3: Then Sakka, lord of gods, and Verocana, lord of demons, approached the Buddha and stationed themselves one by each door-post.
sn11.8:1.4: Then Verocana recited this verse in the Buddha’s presence:
sn11.8:2.3: When goals are accomplished they shine:
sn11.8:2.4: this is the word of Verocana!”
sn11.8:3.3: Of goals that shine when accomplished,
sn11.8:3.4: none better than patience is found.”
sn11.8:4.2: as befits them in each case.
sn11.8:4.4: of pleasures for all living creatures.
sn11.8:4.5: When goals are accomplished they shine:
sn11.8:4.6: this is the word of Verocana!”
sn11.8:5.2: as befits them in each case.
sn11.8:5.4: of pleasures for all living creatures.
